dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Call me Don Quixote! A Little Sister of the Middle, and a trusty minion to the Big Brother! Pleased to make thine acquaintance!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: 'Tis a wonderful morn! Art thou aware of the goings of the Big Brother today? Share with me such details!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: The Big Brother invites me to dine out together this lunch! Wilt thou be joining us? Marry, he so generously offered to pay!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: 'Tis only proper that a party accompanies a dinner! Our dinners are always party-like, full of busy, jovial chatters.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: True villainy is to bother a member, a family of the Middle! And to smite our two—no, threefold vengeance upon those curs is true justice!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Our Big Brother is one who pays much care to styling his hair. It is said that he frequents a... rather boutique hair shop in one of the portships marked by affluence.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Though mine strength may be incomparable to the Big Brother's... I must still muse. Is he stronger than I tenfold? A hundredfold? Hm hm!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Ha ha! Wherefore hath thou meddled with one of our own? Now, pay thy price!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Lo! Read it well, for this is the Book of Vengeance. Here are tasks that we must complete to achieve justice.
Behold, written here is thy name. Wouldst thou like for me to erase it? ... Then thou must perish.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: 'Tis important to keep the Book organized. For one day I shall rise to become a Big Sister... nay, a Great Sister!

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I have been tasked by the Big Brother himself to carry out this quest for the Book of Vengeance! Haha, heigh-ho! I must live up to his expectations!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: There be a cur who deserves our vengeance, then?!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Allow me!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Ah! Hath the Big Brother summoned me?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Ha ha! Charge!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Steel thyself! The Book demands that thy death be carried out in clear mind.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Vengeance hath been executed.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: To end here... is... No. The Middle... will remember...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Hah! Bring forth a real challenge!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Mine conviction must have fallen short...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Thus this vengeance hath been carried out to the end! There is more to boast this evening!

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Let's see... Indeed! This entire row may be crossed out. The Big Brother must be pleased, for I have played a significant part in this quest!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Lest you forget... The Middle remembers... The Middle records... And Vengeance shall rain down upon thee tenfold.
